question: World's First “Smart Train” based on Autonomous Rail Rapid Transit (ART) has been launched recently in which country?
explanation: World's First “Smart Train” based on Autonomous Rail Rapid Transit (ART) has been launched in China. The train is currently only operating on a small 3.1-kilometre-long stretch with just four stations and will soon go into regular service from next year. The rail system is capable of carrying 300 passengers in its three carriages and has a top speed of 70 kilometres per hour.
